```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(mlr3website)
library(htmltools)
library(mlr3misc)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
library(mlr3tuning)
library(mlr3hyperband)
library(mlr3mbo)

content = as.data.table(mlr_tuners)

content[, packages := map(packages, function(x) setdiff(x, c("bbotk")))]
content[, base_package := map(man, function(x) strsplit(x, "::", TRUE)[[1]][1])]

# add line breaks to cells
sdcols = c("param_classes", "properties", "packages")
content[, (sdcols) := map(.SD, function(col) map_chr(col, function(x) paste0(x, collapse = "\n"))), .SDcols = sdcols]

# add link to name and package
content[, key := pmap_chr(list(key, base_package), function(key, base_package) as.character(a(href = sprintf("https://%s.mlr-org.com/reference/mlr_tuners_%s.html", base_package, key), key)))]

content[, `:=`(base_package = NULL, man = NULL)]
col_names = c("Name", "Classes", "Properties", "Packages")
```

## Tuners

```{r, layout="l-body-outset"}
table_responsive(content, escape = FALSE, col.names = col_names)
```
